skins.selfIntroduction: Never have I received orders, nor have I ever accomplished anything. I am merely a blank slate¡ªexisting simply to become the delectable champagne presented to thee, the victor.
skins.acquisition: I am the personification of Champagne, part of the Iris Libre. Commander, please give me an order¡ªa reason to exist.
skins.login: Your orders, Commander. Whatever your will may be, I shall usher into reality.
skins.details: Whether your ambitions leads you into the wilderness of unparalleled achievements, the lofty spires of world domination, or the gardens of peaceful sanctuary, command me as would best serve your will.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, art thou pondering the meaning of life? Or perhaps...
skins.secretaryIdle2: The ebb and flow of tides are natural phenomena, and so are the flowing fates of humankind.
skins.secretaryIdle3: "Live, together with the fleet." Understood. I have received my newest directive from the Commander.
skins.secretaryTouch: The warmth and sensation of being touched... How exceedingly difficult to forget.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Though your transgression may be slight, such conduct may turn others away from you.

skins.shipDescription: It is not against the teachings to halt one's pursuit of destiny and to surrender to the warm draft of festivities. It is mankind's prerogative to seek out auspicious portents.
skins.acquisition: It is not against the teachings to halt one's pursuit of destiny and to surrender to the warm draft of festivities. It is mankind's prerogative to seek out auspicious portents.
skins.login: What I desire on the first day of the new year... a peaceful night's sleep, and a rainbow-colored dream that reflects my wishes.
skins.details: Reliving one's childhood by enjoying games is one way to enjoy festivities. That being the case, I lack knowledge of the rules designated for these games...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Mountains, birds, fruits. All wonderful signs of a dream in which spring blooms forth.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Our connected memories spread out, like freshly-fallen powder snow, as our affected emotions are as if blown by the spring breeze. ...May these peaceful festivities spr
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Animals attempt to break their fetters in order to satiate their desires, whereas humans challenge taboos to satiate their curiosity.
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Hm...? Did you want to know about my dreams...?
